sync.description: Boolean param to filter entities processed by integrations. Control flag
sync.title: Sync

limit.description: Param to limit the size of the list of objects of response. Default 500 and max value 2K
limit.title: Response length of objects limit

nextPageToken.description: Key to obtain the next N objects of your query based on the limit value. You can obtain nextPageToken from response to iterate over pages.
nextPageToken.title: Pagination token
